p: Oligocat catalysts were evaluated applying the optimal experimental reaction conditions presented in the previous section and, afterward, compared with the Lewatit SPC 112 as a reference catalyst. Reagents applied were tallow swine and used sauteing oil as triacylglycerol sources, using methanol and ethanol as reagent alcohols. Table 11 presents the investigated reagents and ratio conversions to alkyl esters. All conversion rates are averaged duplicates.
